Vitória.title: Vitória
Vitória.byline: Vitória, the small and cozy capital of Espírito Santo, is a city on the southeast coast of Brazil, famous for its beaches and culture, and for its proximity from many other tourist destinations in the state.

Vitebsk.title: Vitebsk
Vitebsk.byline: Vitebsk or Viciebsk (Belarusian: Віцебск, Russian: Витебск) is the middle of Vitebsk Oblast in Belarus.

Viterbo.title: Viterbo
Viterbo.byline: Viterbo is a city of 68,000 people (2017) in Lazio, a central region of Italy.

Vitoria-Gasteiz.title: Vitoria-Gasteiz
Vitoria-Gasteiz.byline: Vitoria-Gasteiz (Spanish: Vitoria, Basque: Gasteiz) is in the heart of the Basque Country in Spain.

Vitré.title: Vitré
Vitré.byline: Vitré (Breton: Gwitreg; Gallo: Vitræ) is a in the département of Ille-et-Vilaine, in the region of Brittany, France.

Vitória da Conquista.title: Vitória da Conquista
Vitória da Conquista.byline: Vitória da Conquista is a city in the Central South of Bahia.

Vittel.title: Vittel
Vittel.byline: Vittel is a town in Lorraine.

Viti.title: Viti
Viti.byline: Viti (Albanian: Vitia) is a city located in the Gjilan region of Kosovo.
